title: Lanka SSL receives dual recognition at NBEA 2021
body_lines: Lanka Special Steel Limited (Lanka SSL), a BOI-registered company and a fully owned subsidiary of E B Creasy & Company PLC, was awarded the first Runner-Up in the Large Category at the National Business Excellence Awards 2021 held by the National Chamber of Commerce of Sri Lanka (NCCSL).

Lanka SSL was also named Winner in the Manufacturing – Other Sector. The company is no stranger to the awards, having won the second runner-up in the Overall- Large Category and the Gold Award in the Manufacturing Sector- Other Category in the 2018 edition.

Over the years, Lanka SSL has pioneered a wide range of mild steel galvanized iron wire backed by proven scientific research and professional guidance, making it the largest manufacturer and market leader specifically in the fence wire sector with a 70pct market share. Lanka SSL takes great pride in being the only manufacturer in the country to produce galvanized steel wires, with a portfolio serving a multitude of purpose.

CEO and Director of Lanka SSL, Pravin De Silva said: “This achievement wouldn’t have been possible without the tireless dedication and commitment from our employees and the continued trust and loyalty placed “As the pioneer in the steel wire industry having a 25-year history Lanka SSL is always committed to continuously improving its product standards to supply superior quality products to consumers,” Pravin said.
